mapper.insert: insert into review (userId, placeId, reviewId, content, attachedPhotoId, regDate) values (#{userId}, #{placeId}, #{reviewId}, #{content}, #{attachedPhotoId}, now())
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, attachedPhotoId = #{attachedPhotoId}, modDate = now() where reviewId = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: select count(reviewId) from review where placeId = #{placeId}
select content, attachedPhotoId from review where userId = #{userId} and placeId = #{placeId}
